btClient

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.MessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is tasked with deciding which piece to download next and handling the messages received from the peer. This class also handles the logic for deciding when to send a message to the peer and which message to send (the actual sending/receiving is handled by the peer class)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Block block
      Current block to be requested
      private boolean choked
      Indicates whether or not the client is choked by the Peer that this MessageHandler is responsible for
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer clientID
      The local peer_ID for this client
      private boolean[] has_piece
      boolean array to indicate which pieces the client has
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer info_hash
      The TorrentInfo.info_hash for the current torrent file
      private boolean killme
      If true, indicates that this thread has been requested to be killed by the GUI
      private Peer peer
      The Peer that this MessageHandler is responsible for handling
      private Piece piece
      The current piece to be downloaded
      private java.util.ArrayList<Piece> pieces
      An array list of Piece objects that make up the file to be downloaded
      private BtUtils.Status status 
      private ActiveTorrent torrent
      The ActiveTorrent object responsible for managing this MessageHandler
      private TorrentInfo torrentInfo
      All general info relating to this torrent
      private int wasted
      The number of downloaded bytes that this MessageHandler has discarded due to errors or other issues

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageHandler(ActiveTorrent torrent, Peer peer)
      Returns a new message handler object, created with the given parameters

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void connect()
      Attempts to connect to the given peer, if connection is successful or if the peer is already connected, send appropriate have messages to the peer
      private Piece getNextPiece()
      Returns the next piece that the peer has and has not yet been downloaded; Implements Rarest-Piece-First Algorithm
      BtUtils.Status getStatus()
      Gets the current status of this MessageHandler
      int getWasted()
      Goes to the bar and drinks heavily
      private void handleMessage(byte[] message)
      Identifies the given message and calls the appropriate method to handle it
      void kill()
      Sets the killme field to true to indicate this MessageHandler should die when possible
      private void receiveBitfield(byte[] message)
      Reads a bitfield message and sets the boolean values of peer_has_piece accordingly.
      private void receiveChoke(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming choke message, sets the client choke flag to true.
      private void receiveHave(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming have message, sends an interested request to the peer if client doesn't have the piece indicated in the message
      private void receiveInterested(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming interested message, sets the peer's interested field to true.
      private void receivePiece(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming piece message from the peer.
      private void receiveRequest(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming request message, sends the request piece to the peer if the piece is available and the peer is not choked
      private void receiveUnchoke(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming unchoke message, sets the client choke flag to false.
      private void receiveUninterested(byte[] message)
      Handles an incoming uninterested message form the peer, simply sets the peer interested flag to false.
      void run() 
      private void updateHasPiece()
      updates the has_piece boolean array for this thread, and checks completeness / updates complete

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
